title: MERN Admin Panel
about: A full-stack MERN application with secure admin features and user management.
features: User Authentication – Secure login and registration using JWT and bcrypt.
Admin Dashboard – View, update, and delete users, services, and contact messages.
Contact Form – Users can send messages directly through a dynamic contact page.
Authorization Middleware – Role-based route protection for admin and regular users.
Responsive UI – Clean and interactive design built with React and Tailwind CSS.
MongoDB Integration – Fully connected backend with data persistence and validation.

title: Car Rental
about: A car rental website with an easy-to-use interface.
features: Smart Search – Quickly find any Pokémon by name, type, or ID with instant results.
Detailed Profiles – Explore each Pokémon’s stats, abilities, types, evolutions, and more.
Clean UI – Enjoy a modern, user-friendly interface designed for smooth navigation.
Responsive Design – Fully optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

title: World Atlas
about: An interactive world atlas built with React, designed to provide quick insights into countries around the globe.
features: Country Explorer – Browse and learn about each country's capital, population, and interesting facts.
Dynamic Routing – Smooth navigation between countries using React Router.
Clean Interface – Minimalistic and responsive UI optimized for all devices.
JSON Data Integration – Loads structured country data dynamically from a local JSON source.

title: Movie Flix
about: A modern movie browsing web app using the OMDb API to explore films and TV shows.
features: Live Movie Search – Instantly search for movies by title using real-time API requests.
Detailed Info – View poster, release year, type, and IMDb details for each result.
Pagination Support – Load multiple result pages for extended browsing.
Clean & Responsive UI – Built with React and Tailwind, optimized for all screen sizes.

title: PokeGlance
about: A car rental website with a clean UI.
features: Easy Booking – Choose date, time, and location to book your car.
Vehicle Selection – Browse cars by type, brand, price, and features.
Secure Payments – Pay safely online with instant booking confirmation.
User Dashboard – View and manage all your bookings in one place.
24/7 Support – Get help anytime with customer service and roadside assistance.

title: Personal Portfolio
about: A modern, responsive personal portfolio website showcasing my work, skills, and contact information.
features: Hero Section – Engaging introduction with name, role, and quick action buttons.
Project Highlights – Interactive project cards with modal popups detailing each project.
Service Section – Visual representation of offered services using clean cards and icons.
Responsive Design – Fully optimized layout for desktop, tablet, and mobile viewing.
Contact Form – Easily accessible contact form integrated with Web3Forms for form submission.
Smooth Animations – Enhanced user experience with AOS-based scroll animations.

title: Currency Converter
about: A modern currency converter app built with React and React Query for real-time exchange rate conversions.
features: Live Exchange Rates – Convert between multiple currencies using up-to-date exchange data.
React Query Integration – Efficient API calls with caching, background updates, and refetch control.
Instant Conversion – Convert amounts instantly with minimal delay and error handling.
Responsive UI – Sleek and responsive interface adaptable to all screen sizes.
Error Handling – Graceful handling of API errors and invalid input to improve user experience.

title: Keeper
about: Keeper where you can add and delete notes
features: Save Notes – Easily create and save notes.
Edit Notes – Modify and update your notes anytime.
Delete Notes – Remove unwanted notes with a simple click.
Store Notes – Your notes persist even after reloads.

title: Todo App
about: A Todo App built with React.
features: Add Tasks – Users can input new tasks seamlessly.
Edit Tasks – Existing tasks can be modified to reflect changes.
Delete Tasks – Unwanted tasks can be removed effortlessly.
Mark as Completed – Tasks can be marked to indicate completion status.
Responsive Design – The application is fully responsive, ensuring usability across various devices.

title: Notes
about: A Notes website where you can write important points.
features: Save Notes – Easily create and save notes.
Edit Notes – Modify and update your notes anytime.
Delete Notes – Remove unwanted notes with a simple click.
Store Notes – Your notes persist even after reloads.

title: Education Template
about: Frontend Design of an Education Template.
features: Education Template Frontend Design

title: Netflix Front-end Design
about: Frontend Design of a Netflix clone.
features: Netflix Frontend Design
